title: PB PRO BLOOM 1GAL
description: PURE BLEND Pro is a hydro-organic vegetative, fruit, and flower formula. It features a special blend of organic and natural sources in 100% soluble form from the land and sea. PURE BLEND Pro produces vigorous lush green vegetation and superior fruits, flowers, and vegetables. Implementing PURE BLEND Pro into your indoor garden is a healthy, environmentally-friendly alternative to more chemically-based brands.
